attributes.description:
Get your hands on this brand new 2022 VW Tiguan Allspace 1.4 Life DSG today and save R45,000.00 and get a 90 day payment holiday!

Now only R691,300.00
Extras include: Inductive Charging, Leather, Winter Package, Rear View Camera, Park Assist.
